records.note: Johny is a 13-year-old black male diagnosed with Leukemia.

Johny is a 13-year-old African-American male diagnosed with cancer of the blood. Patient's mother was also diagnosed with cancer of the bloodLeukemia is cancer of the blood and bone marrow (the soft material in the center of most bones).He has chronic heart failure. He has had problems in school.
Johny is a 13-year-old african american male diagnosed with leukemia.
He reports suffering from major anxiety. Johny reports sleeping at night is difficult.
